welcome_message_body: Welcome to Miami, where the sun always shines and the beaches are pristine. Explore the city's vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and lively nightlife - you're sure to fall in love with the Magic City. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: El Vallarta
restaurants.description: El Vallarta is a mexican restaurant located in Miami.

restaurants.name: Waylan's Ku-Ku Burgers

restaurants.name: Long John Silver's
restaurants.description: Long John Silver's is a seafood restaurant located in Miami.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
